name: Alicia Quatermain 2 (Platinum)
description:
The NEW game in the Alicia Quatermain series is here! This time our brave explorer is on a quest to retrieve The Stone of Fate – an ancient artefact lost in the distant lands. Travel to remote locations, complete puzzles and help Alicia solve the mystery!

Alicia Quatermain 2: The Stone of Fate is a tale of a smart girl-turned-adventurer! On the hunt for the Stone of Fate, Alicia must travel from Indian jungles to Tibetan mountains, overcoming traps, disasters, and saving tiger cubs along the way. Challenging puzzles, plot twists, treasure hunts and exciting adventures await you! Embark on a strategic time management quest today with Alicia Quatermain 2: The Stone of Fate!

GAME FEATURES:
• Explore the World: tour from India to Tibet!
• Discover the story of the Stone of Fate: embark on an adventure with tons of surprises!
• Beautiful HD graphics: travel across beautifully crafted locations!
• Choose your style: play casually or take on special challenges in difficult mode!
• Find hidden puzzles and bonus levels!
• Completely AD FREE experience: pure gameplay and NO ADS!
